_xResult.title: Fan Favorite: Royal Purple Mermaid Ensemble
_xResult.shortdesc: 4 pieces! Custom made lace top, skirt, undergarments
_xResult.longdesc:
**Voted the Fans' Favorite Piece from Ashley's Project Runway Final Collection -- wear the dress that helped her win the season!**

 

Celebrity designer Ashley Nell Tipton herself will be your personal guide to dress perfection when you order any of her couture made-to-measure garments. You'll talk with her directly as she interviews you to understand your style and fit goals, to personalize your final outfit. You're not just buying a dress, you're stepping into a whole new world of personal service and expert construction.

 

Show off your curves in this amazing four-piece ensemble that is red-carpet worthy at any event. The structured silky lace crop top with high-waisted lace skirt gives undeniable comfort while it defines your curves. The skirt comes lined with the perfectly matched purple high waisted undies and a bandeau top to wear with or without a strapless bra. The best part of it all is the breathability of the sheer lace: you're sexy and comfy at the same time!

 

Details:

  1. Crop top is non-stretch high quality nylon lace that looks and feels great and has firm structure, hand cutout scallop edge on the neck, hem and elbow length sleeves; hidden zipper in the back for easy on/off.
  2. Lace six-panel mermaid skirt with a hidden zipper in the back, scalloped-edge waistband; it's form fitting on the hips and flares out to the hem, finishing with horsehair binding on the hem to have the perfect flair.
  3. and 4. Underneath garments: bandeau top is a spandex knit to fit perfectly over your strapless bra, with matching high waisted underwear that are meant to be shown. If you'd prefer a more modest look, you can specify an alternative bottom layer that is a pencil skirt shape.
 
Customizations available: Sleeve length, bottom undergarment (choose high waisted underwear as shown or a pencil skirt to wear under the lace skirt).
